entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Mont-Saint-Hilaire
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:34 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
